I love Halloween. The one time of year when everyone wears a mask … not just me. Rorschach would say you have a hard time relating to others. I think he's got a crush on you, Dex! Pretend. You pretend the feelings are there, for the world, for the people around you. Who knows? Maybe one day they will be.
  1. I'm not the monster he wants me to be. So I'm neither man nor beast. I'm something new entirely. With my own set of rules. I'm Dexter. Boo.
  2. I feel like a jigsaw puzzle missing a piece. And I'm not even sure what the picture should be.
  3. I'm Dexter, and I'm not sure what I am.
This man is a knight in shining armor.
You look…perfect. I like seafood. I think he's got a crush on you, Dex! I am not a killer.
  • You're a killer. I catch killers.
  • I'm really more an apartment person.
  • Tell him time is of the essence.
